resources.string: I have read and agree to
The account or password is incorrect
For your data privacy and security, your device information will only be stored on the server where your account is registered
Password must contain 8-30 characters include digits and letters
The verification code has been sent to

Welcome to ipTIME! ipTIME is developed and operated by ipTIME IoT Technology Co., Ltd. It's a platform to provide online video and audio.
 User Agreement & Privacy Policy will help you get a comprehensive understanding of how we collect, use, store and share your personal information, as well as what rights you enjoy. 
 In order to provide services such as live video, video playback, favorite subscription, community interaction, etc., we may collect the following types of personal information, including video recording, videos and pictures, device information, operation logs, etc. 
 You can access/update/delete your information and manage the permissions via "Me" interface on the app. 
 We will take all practicable steps to safeguard your personal information.
 You can get more information via %1$s & %2$s. 
 If your agree to it, please click "Agree" to get the service.
Create a smart life with new experience.
Are you sure to turn off the device?
Are you sure to turn on the device?
Scan the QR code on the device
Requires scanning a QR code to connect and bind the device. Allow access to the camera?
No camera permissions, please enable it in settings
Allow APP to use your location information?
Location permission is required to obtain Wi-Fi information for adding devices; please enable system location
The positioning permission is disabled. Please enable it in Settings
Allow \"APP\" to use your album information？
Requires viewing and sending pictures. Allow access to the photo album?
Allow \"APP\" to use your Bluetooth information？
Bluetooth permission is required to help the smart device connect to Wi-Fi during the adding process. Do you agree to enable it?
The Bluetooth permission is disabled. Please enable it in Settings
Please ensure your cellphone is close to the camera
Please try again after the following operations:
1. Long press the reset button to reset the device
2. Check whether the access restriction is enabled on the router
Save the device QR code to the album
The current Wi-Fi may be 5GHz Wi-Fi, while the device only supports 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. Are you sure to continue to use?
1. Connect your phone to the camera hotspot: Wi-Fi starting with \"XT-\"
1. The device may not support fast networking (hotspot connection).Please follow the device voice prompts to select the connection method.
2. The distance between the mobile phone and the device is too far. A suitable distance is within 30 cm.
Make sure to complete the adding process by returning to APP after connecting to the Wi-Fi that starts with \"XT-\".
Confirm the device is waiting to connect, put your cellphone close to the camera
Select the device you want to share
%s visitors can be added at most,please delete some if you want to continue sharing with others.
Enter the account that needs to be shared
User name error. Please enter again.
Are you sure to share the device with %s?
Scan the QR code using the APP to share
Failed to get the QR code. Click to refresh
Invalid share. Ask the host to reshare.
Invalid QR code. Ask the host to regenerate
Sharing is not supported because you are not in the same area as the host
Are you sure to delete the device?
Scan the QR code on the device or the QR code shared by others
Are you sure to delete this shared friend?
Removal failed. Please try again later
Are you sure to stop sharing this device?
Adding a camera is required to enable smart Home watching.
Using 3G/4G data traffic may generate traffic charges
Enable notifications from %s, to get the latest news
Please enter your contact E-mail address
Submitted successfully, thanks very much for your feedback
The nickname must be less than 24 characters in length
The phone number has been bound successfully
The phone number has changed successfully
The mailbox has been bound successfully
The mailbox has been changed successfully
Are you sure to log out?
The following info and records will be cleared up after the account is closed
All your personal information and historical information will not be recovered.
Your downloads and purchase records will be cleared up unrecoverably, and non-refundably.
Any accumulated rank, credits and benefits will be invalid and cannot be recovered.
All the devices you bind will be unbound. For further use, please register and re-add.
For account security, please verify the login password first
If you forget the original password, please log out and then click Forget Password, and reset the password with the verification code
After closing the account, all information and data will be cleared up
Account cancellation successful! Thank you for using our service.
What you need to know after cancellation:
You are no longer able to log in with the bound phone number/E-mail and third party account
Click here to quickly add a device, share a device or scan
Device deleting by Long press the device card. Device sorting by dragging the device card
All devices are in the latest version
Do keep the camera running during the whole upgrade process that lasts about 5 to 10 minutes! Or the camera may be unavailable. (The camera will be offline during the upgrade.)
%s upgrade failed. Please try again later
%s download failed. Please try again later
%s upgrade failed. Please try again after restarting the device or inserting the memory card
%s download failed. Please try again after checking the device network
%s upgrade failed. Please try again after restarting the device
Current network unavailable. Check your network settings
The network is busy, please try again later
This phone number has been registerd
The name length exceeds the limit.
The system is in maintenance. Please try again later
It has reached the upper limit
This camera has been linked to another account. Please unlink it first.
Connection timeout, please check the network
The quantity of added items has reached the upper limit
Your account has expired. Please register a new account
Too many attempts. Please try again later.
Password must contain 8-30 characters including digits and letters.
Please enter the country code before phone numbers,Eg:+86-1234567
No playback available at this time.
Failed to submit,please try again later.
Please describe the query or problem you encountered in detail.
Share application and device log information to accurately locate issues.
To resolve issues quickly, please leave your phone number or email address.
Enable Bluetooth on your cellphone to add a device quickly
Please allow new connection in Settings
GPS is not enabled, so the Wi-Fi list cannot be retrieved. Please set it up now.
You have selected 5GWi-Fi, please confirm whether the device supports 5G frequency band. If it is not supported, the addition will fail. Continue to add?
You can select up to %s photos.
[%s] has been offline for over 30 minutes. Please inspect the device.

Abnormal battery power is detected, please make sure the device has been plugged into the power adapter. To prevent the power from being exhausted too soon, it has been automatically switched to power saving mode.
It is detected that you have plugged in the power adapter, you may switch to non-sleep mode.
This user is already a visitor of this device

1.The camera may not support quick network connection (hotspot connection). Please follow the device\'s voice prompts to select the connection method. \n2.The distance between the phone and the device is too far. A distance within 30 centimeters is more appropriate.
Enter the email address you can use for registering a ipTIME account
The device name cannot be empty
The device name scene is empty
Distribution network failed, please add again

• All your personal information and historical information will not be recovered. 

• Your downloads and purchase records will be cleared up unrecoverably, and non-refundably. 

• Any accumulated rank, credits and benefits will be invalid and cannot be recovered. 

• You are no longer able to log in with the bound phone number/E-mail and third party account. 

• All the devices you bind will be unbound. For further use, please register and re-add.
• You are no longer able to log in with the bound phone number/E-mail and third party account. \n\n• All the devices you bind will be unbound. For further use, please register and re-add.
The APP version is too low to be compatible with this new device.
tips: The QR code is the unique identification code of the device. Please keep it properly!

Enable it to timely receive the latest messages from APP
Enable it to help the device connect to Wi-Fi when being added
Enable it to help save video screenshots and recordings
We recommend you enable it to timely receive alerts when the app is running in the background
Enable it to add a device by scanning
Enable it to use the device as a voice intercom and customize voice
Enable it to use mini-window video playback and floating nursing alarm
Enable it to timely receive nursing alarm notifications

The following devices are not available in the current APP
Please download the \"WoWCam\" APP to continue using the device
